participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and nurturing, enjoys sharing knowledge and experiences.
participant_1.background: i've visited spain a times. i'm 60years old. i think i'll retire in a few years. i am a librarian.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: cheerful and caring, finds joy in helping others and cherishes family time.
participant_2.background: i'm a baby delivery nurse. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i walk three miles every day. i love to spend time with my family.
